attributes.additional_details:
FED UP HEARING ABOUT THE 18 - 24 YEAR OLDS THAT CANNOT FIND A JOB?
**************************************************************

What about those outside the 18 - 24 range?

Let us older ones get in the workplace and sort the mess out.

We have lots of experience.

Then we will hire the young ones.

Both the young and old working side by side.

A Win-Win Situation!
**********************************************************
